mapper.select: SELECT br.number,u.phone onePhone, br.number_one_amount, uu.phone twoPhone,br.number_two_amount, uuu.phone threePhone, br.number_three_amount FROM odin_buying_rank br LEFT JOIN USER u ON u.id=br.number_one_id LEFT JOIN USER uu ON uu.id=br.number_two_id LEFT JOIN USER uuu ON uuu.id=br.number_three_id
